name: Distress
description:
Distress is a Yume Nikki Fangame made for the 4th Dream Diary Jam.

Help Saya find the effects.

Please note, there's no save system yet so you can't save your progess. There may also be some bugs

F1 - Fullscreen
Up - Interact
W/Z - Jump
X - Action
C - Menu
V - Wake up

There is 11 effects to find.
You can mix up all the effect together, making a total of 55 mixes.
